attributes.action: alter benefits so the maximum benefit a person receives  is less than the minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't believe that there is any incentive for people to return to work when they can live a comfortable life living off the state. It should be the case that benefits are paid below the minimum wage. Then and only then would it be worth people looking for work. The majority of these people do not have pride so there is not point appealing to it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
